Title: Quran Recitation for Beginners
Subtitle: Learn Correct & Fluent Qur'an Recitation With 0 Experience

FAQ.Question: Do I need any prior knowledge?
FAQ.Answer: No. This course starts from zero.

FAQ.Question: Can I start with zero Arabic?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course is designed for non-Arab & English-speaking students.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult for beginners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is taught through practice, not theory.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to read the Qur'an on my own?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Step-by-step fluency training leads to independent reading.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patience and clear guidance — never pressure.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program designed for absolute beginners to learn Qur'an recitation step by step — from Arabic letters to confident, independent reading. Focuses on correct pronunciation, basic Tajwīd, fluency, and building a strong foundation.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Learners who never studied Arabic reading
Students who want a clear, guided starting point

Sections.Heading: Course Structure
Content:
Tajwīd for Beginners (Practical)
  • Ghunna
  • Heavy & light letters
  • Basic stops

Sections.Heading: What Will You Achieve
Content: Ability to read words and verses smoothly
Strong foundation for continued Qur'an study
